p: We also used the decomposition method 24 based on Budyko Framework ( Supplementary Fig. S1 and Methods) to validate the relative contribution of human activities and climate change to streamflow change. Although the former merely attributes streamflow change to climate change and direct human impacts, without considering the contribution of precipitation and PET separately, the overall results are similar to that of the elasticity method from comparing the results derived from the decomposition and elasticity methods ( Supplementary Fig. S8).
